titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Distant shores [sound recording] : music for the Great Lakes / Richard Olsenius.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen

did.unittitle: Distant shores [sound recording] : music for the Great Lakes / Richard Olsenius.

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: Two Harbors, Minn. : Bluestem Productions, c1993.

odd.head: Participant or Performer
odd.p: Composed and produced by Richard Olsenius.

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: A distant shore (5:35) -- The sleeping giant (4:08) -- Winter forest (4:39) -- Upbound (3:55) -- Above the shore (4:00) -- Aerial view (2:04) -- Wolf moon (3:55) -- Steel town (3:28) -- Autumn guitar (6:48) -- Beyond the Sault (4:10) -- From within a fog (5:38).

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: With: Distant shores : photographs from Lake Superior and Lake Michigan.
